sentences.en: A bad shearer never had a good sickle.
A born beauty , escape everything however his that sickle for sweep.
sentences.cn: 天生丽质, 什么都逃不过他那横扫的镰刀.

sentences.en: A sickle moon was in the sky.
sentences.cn: 弯弯的月亮正悬在空中.

sentences.en: Are patients with sickle cell disease at greater risk of infection?
sentences.cn: 镰状细胞病患者是否有更高的感染机会?

sentences.en: Can tourniquets be used in patients with sickle cell disease?
sentences.cn: 止血带能否用于镰状细胞病患者?

sentences.en: Family history. If your family has a history of an inherited anemia, such as sickle cell anemia, you also may be at increased risk of the condition.
sentences.cn: 家族史如果你有亲人患有遗传性的贫血，比如镰刀细胞性贫血，那么你患有这种贫血的风险也会比一般人高。

sentences.en: He reached out his hand for the sickle I offered him.
sentences.cn: 他伸出手,接我给他的镰刀.

sentences.en: He swished the tops off weeds with a sickle.
sentences.cn: 他挥动镰刀嗖嗖地割掉了杂草的草尖.

sentences.en: Is there a difference between sickle cell disorder, disease and anemia?
sentences.cn: 镰状细胞紊乱 、 镰状细胞病和镰状细胞性贫血之间有何差异?

sentences.en: She bought herself a hoe and a sickle.
sentences.cn: 她给自己买了一把锄头和一把镰刀.

sentences.en: Sickle-cell anaemia is passed on through a recessive gene.
sentences.cn: 镰状细胞贫血通过隐性基因遗传给后代。

sentences.en: Take the sickle which is lying on the grindstone.
sentences.cn: 把磨刀石上的那把镰刀拿去.

sentences.en: Tell her to reap it with a sickle of leather.
sentences.cn: 请她用皮制的镰刀收割.

sentences.en: The flag flutters everywhere, beside red banners with the hammer and sickle, a reminder that the country is one of the last to uphold Marxist values.
sentences.cn: 国旗各处飘扬，伴随着印有镰刀斧头的红色横幅，提醒人们，这是最后一个坚持马克思主义价值观的国家。

sentences.en: There is a picture of the sickle on the flag.
What organs are at risk for ischemia in sickle cell diseaese?
sentences.cn: 镰状细胞病时哪些器官有缺血的危险?

sentences.en: Yes, I've seen the crescent moon again - a chill sickle of pale gold.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我又看见月牙儿了,带着点寒气的一钩儿浅金.

trans.tran_cn: 镰刀，收割机中的切割装置
trans.tran_en: a tool with a blade in the shape of a hook, used for cutting wheat or long grass
